snippet.title: Sisters: The Last Day of Summer - Ultra Edition - Official English Trailer
snippet.description:
Published by JAST USA
Developed by Jellyfish
Release Date: March 2024

Within a family, a secret lies undiscovered. A boy suddenly wakes up in a house and sees a woman he does not know in front of him. This woman explains she lives in this house with her two daughters and invites our protagonist to start his life with them, to enjoy a simple life.

With a clumsy mother like Akiko and her kind daughters Haruka and Chika, your new daily life will be different from what you were used to. Spend time and learn more about your new family, forming a unique and heartwarming bond.

Featuring fully voiced and animated scenes, feel each character's personality and intentions more vividly and naturally as you dive into the story. Each scene was carefully thought out and created to keep you hooked from the very first moment you start your new life.

Follow JAST USA for more information:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jastusa
Discord: https://discord.gg/rMGjzQE 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jastusa
